title: Stripe’s real pricing: a primer
dot:
digraph StripePricing{rankdir=LR;node[shape=rect, style=filled, fontname="Arial", fontsize=10, width=2, height=0.75, fillcolor="#f9f9f9", color="#333"];subgraph cluster_intro{label="Disclaimer & Introduction";node[fillcolor="#E0E0E0"];disclaimer[label="Disclaimer:
Public pricing as of July 2022"];intro[label="How much do you pay for Stripe?"];}subgraph cluster_stripe_products{label="Stripe Product Complexity";node[fillcolor="#F1F1F1"];payment_processing[label="Stripe Payments
(card processing fees)"];other_products[label="Other Products
(20+ products)"];complexity[label="Combination of products increases pricing complexity"];}subgraph cluster_b2b_saas{label="Example 1: B2B SaaS (Typographic)";node[fillcolor="#E8F5E9"];b2b_saas[label="Stripe Products for B2B SaaS:
1. Stripe Payments
2. Billing
3. Invoicing
..."];b2b_costs[label="Direct Costs
(card payments, additional fees for bank transfers)"];}subgraph cluster_vertical_saas{label="Example 2: Vertical SaaS (Toast, Mindbody)";node[fillcolor="#FFEBEE"];vertical_saas[label="Stripe Products for Vertical SaaS:
1. Stripe Payments
2. Stripe Connect
..."];vertical_costs[label="Direct Costs
(commission fees, per account charges)"];}subgraph cluster_indirect_costs{label="Indirect Costs";node[fillcolor="#FFF3E0"];engineering[label="Engineering Resources
(implementing product suite)"];user_interface[label="User Interface Solutions
(e.g., Billflow)"];switching_costs[label="High Switching Costs"];}subgraph cluster_reliance{label="Reliance on Stripe Products";node[fillcolor="#FFF9C4"];reliance[label="Relying on Stripe increases switching costs"];alternatives[label="Limited flexibility
(cannot connect to other payment processors)"];}disclaimer->intro;intro->payment_processing;intro->other_products;payment_processing->complexity;other_products->complexity; b2b_saas->b2b_costs;vertical_saas->vertical_costs;b2b_costs->vertical_saas;vertical_costs->vertical_saas; engineering->user_interface;user_interface->switching_costs;switching_costs->reliance;reliance->alternatives;intro->b2b_saas;intro->vertical_saas;complexity->indirect_costs;indirect_costs->reliance;}
